content: My daughter is 2 1/2 years old and has no trouble managing the app. You also have the option to turn off the puzzles. I'm impressed although I think the numbers app and the letters app is far more effective and worth your money. I on the other hand have bought all three ü§≠ I'll most likely buy the shapes app eventually too.

My son didn't like the app at all, even though he loves Dave and Ava, he just likes the introduction and then losses interest on the game, besides the game was just about puzzles doesn't have more games, I have downloaded better games for him with a lot of more content for free
Meh
Worth it. My 10 months old daughter loved it.. üòç

I paid for this but im not satisfied with the app...i thought all the games for dave and ava will be unlock but only this nonsense puzzle works. I think this is a scam strategy. I hope i can get a refund.
Only has 10 pictures :( and no addition :(. B. Please add more pictures
Freezes all the time
This app freezes everytime I use it with my kids. Very annoying.

My son doesn't do index finger pointing. My son loves this app. So I tried this app with him and my son started using his index finger to feed the animals with a little bit of help (gentle prompting). I wish you could add more animals. Then I would have given 5 stars.
Worst app not as adverised

My daughter loves this app it's been awhile since I purchased it but I just got her a new tablet and when I try to download this app on her tablet it's requesting for me to purchase the app again while on my phone it shows purchased... Anyone can help me please??
it's very kid friendly n my 2yr old loves it
does not work on large tablet
Very buggy. Often crashes, often doesn't work as expected :(
Another great Dave and Ava app! My great-granddaughter really enjoys the puzzles!
kindof useless. kids see the cow mooing and eating grass (etc) on the free app. This doesn't offer anything further

Great idea, great animation but incredibly buggy for a paid app. Also a 
little short on features 3 tricks and a puzzle. Love dave and eva, dont 
love the lack of updates.

Dav and Ava is the best thing that got put on this Earth, downside to this 
app is not a lot of multiple things to do on here. There isn't enough 
activity on this game. Other than that I love it and my baby boy does as 
well. Thank you
No updates.
Does what it says

I love this app. My toddler loves it too. It has a double-tap issue where 
if you accidentally double-tap an animal, it will double play, and some of 
the animals freeze up when you press the command buttons and you are forced 
to move to the next animal just to keep the game going.
Where is pay once and watch video offline forever?

I don't have any problems with stability that others have experienced. However; there are a few issues when app is used by a baby.  1st. Clicking on animals doesn't do anything - you have to click one one of the buttons placed in a row below.  2nd. It's hard to hold a phone with small hands and thumbs usually rest on the bottom of the screen that count as touch event - in effect clicking on buttons doesn't work when the bottom of the screen is also touched, the app needs multi ouch support. 3rd. The icon... the app has no icon - it's only the standard android icon that you get when starting a new Android project.  And finally, it could use more variety of animations and games, buy hey.
Had much more expectations like rhymes in the app

It doesn't have any sound - except the intro video - on my Xiaomi Redmi Note 4x. Sometimes it freezes during puzzle play. I have already written a mail to the support. But didn't get any reply since 2017/Nov /29.(!) Unusable as it is.

The app always freezes and we are unable to play because we have to keep closing and then restarting the app. How can I get a refund? I would like to uninstall this app. I have a screenshot of when the app suddenly freezes.
Freezes

My 1 yr old girl loves Dave and Ava... Just stumbled upon Dave and Ava while looking for an ABC song in YouTube.. So glad I clicked on it.. Amazing graphics,  for kids... And this application trully recommended for parents like me... Nice jobs guys!  ***always crashes
Lags during the puzzle (on various devices). Sometimes the puzzle is all set, but you have to touch the bottom rightmost one to have the controls.
I love this app. My kids love Dave and Ava. It's easy enough my 2 year old can use it, but I can also lock it so my 1 year old can watch it. Worth every penny.
Whenever i open the app it crashes

content: The app keeps crashing each time it opens, my daughter has not been able to use it. Waste of money and a total disappointment.
replyContent: Hi! Please contact our support team at app@daveandava.com.

content: how nice if would be free
Not worthy for its money.  Some free apps offer the same and more.
My kids love Dave and Ava, but there really isn't much to this app. It's not worth the money.  The graphics are superior just like their videos, but the game play is almost non existent.
It's such a cute app, but is sticky and we cannot always get the animals to come up. It shouldn't take 6 minutes to get the app to open. I expected more for 3$
I love Dave and Ava but this app was not worth losing 3 $

Love Dave and Ava!! My 10 month old son responds the most to this so much more than Baby Einstein. Speech development is amazing. I work with him too but he loves Dave and Ava!! Thank you! I plan on buying the main app. It's worth the money!!!
If not bugs, that would be perfect!
Your app not working in my Mobil s8
Great app for children. The animations and sounds are fantastic. Our daughter is only one, so it's great to be able to skip the puzzles. I really appreciate the work that's been put into this.
Unable to use. Crashes every time I load
replyContent: Hi! Please, contact our support team at app@daveandava.com

content: It is still a a bit glitchy on my Samsung s7.  Puzzles don't fully rotate then in just won't complete.  There's also only a handful of animals which you get with other free apps.  On the plus side the graphics are excellent and my son, who loves Dave and Ava, still has fun.  Fix the glitches, add some more animals or puzzles and this would be a must have for all Dave and Ava fans!
It's a great idea but after completing the puzzle it hangs too long and my kid loses interest. Should be an instant response for getting it right.

Thank you for bringing this to Android, my 1-year-old adores it, even if we skip the actual puzzles.  When she saw Phillip this morning she couldn't contain herself, and started smiling like nothing I've seen before.  If your child watches Dave & Ava, they will love this.

It has too many glitch still please fix, my 2 years old loves Dave and Ava the game is fun for her, but it gets freeze so many times, the controls gets stuck too and it is frustrating üò§ for her and for me. Please fix I don't want to uninstall
My toddler loves Dave and  Ava. This app with the farm animals is fun for her.
